summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chintan AI-powered news app. Backend APIs working excellently (92.3% success rate). Frontend loads properly with authentication, articles display correctly, navigation works. Minor UI interaction issues with bottom action buttons due to overlay interception.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 405 Method Not Allowed instead of 401 Unauthorized for unauthenticated PUT requests
minor_bugs.impact: Incorrect HTTP status code, but doesn't break functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Main content overlay intercepts pointer events on bottom action buttons (Ask AI, Other Side, Poll, Discuss)
ui_bugs.workaround: Buttons are visible but not clickable due to z-index/overlay issues

passed_tests: Backend health check and API connectivity
Articles endpoint returns 12 Indian news articles with all required fields
Interest categories endpoint returns expected categories
Authentication flow - proper 401 responses for protected routes
Login page loads with Google sign-in button
Feed page loads with authentication and displays articles
Article cards display properly with categories and metadata
Navigation between pages (Feed, Profile, Brief) works
Category filters work and update article display
Article page loads with collapsible sections (What, Why, Context, Impact)
Dark theme with red accent colors implemented correctly
Responsive design adapts to mobile viewport
Poll endpoint works for articles with polls
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix z-index/overlay issue on ArticlePage bottom action bar - main content element is intercepting clicks on Ask AI, Other Side, Poll, and Discuss buttons. Reduce z-index of main content or increase z-index of action bar.
